## Introduction to broom

lm function

```{r}
lmfit <- lm(mpg ~ wt, data = mtcars)

lmfit

summary(lmfit)


```

```{r}
tidy(lmfit)

augment(lmfit)

```

glm function

```{r}
glmfit <- glm(am ~ wt, mtcars, family = "binomial")

tidy(glmfit)
augment(glmfit)

glance(glmfit)

```

```{r}
nlsfit <- nls(mpg ~ k / wt + b, mtcars, start = list(k = 1, b = 0))

tidy(nlsfit)
augment(nlsfit, mtcars)

tt <- t.test(wt ~ am, mtcars)
tidy(tt)

wt

```
